camstep2description.message: Move your hand (or fist) from the top to bottom.

camstep3description.message: The black layer will automatically slide down.

charttitleavgday.message: Average daily schedule (when the lights turn off frequently)

charttitletotaltime.message: Total time the dark layer is active (minutes)

des1checkmotion.message: Pobrinite se da u vašoj sobi nije mrak i da ima dovoljno svjetla.

des2checkmotion.message: Vaša kamera ne smije primati izravnu sunčevu svjetlost.

desaddvideobutton.message: Prikaži tipku dodaj iz ovog YouTube videozapisa.

desalllightsoff.message: Klikanje na gumb svijetla će uključiti/isključiti svijetla na svim otvorenim karticama

desambilight.message: Prikazuje vam efekt atmosfernog osvjetljenja na videozapisu koji je trenutno u reprodukciji.

desambilightrangeblurradius.message: Lower values will sharpen the shadow, higher values will make them more blurred.

desambilightrangespreadradius.message: Pozitivne vrijednosti povećavaju veličinu sjene, negativne vrijednosti smanjuju veličinu.

desapitext.message: Wiki API za Razvojne Programere Web Stranica

desatmosontotlmode.message: Show the atmosphere lighting effect only when TOtL mode is enabled

desauroraplayer.message: The ambient lighting player is also available for your computer.

desautoplay.message: Automatski zamuti pozadinu kada kliknete na tipku reproduciraj i obrnuto.

desautoplaydelay.message: Brighten the background again when the video has ended after

desautostop.message: Stop playing the video automatically when I open a web page

desautostopfeatureblack.message: ALLOWS below websites, but BLOCKS automatic playing on any other website.

desautostopfeaturewhite.message: BLOCKS below websites, but ALLOWS automatic playing on any other website.

descontextmenus.message: Prikaži kontekstni izbornik za usredotočenje na stavku.

description.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the videos as if you were in the cinema. Works for YouTube™ and beyond.

desdarkbrowsertheme.message: Switch to a dark browser theme

deseastereggs.message: Pritiskom tipke T dodaje se zastor na tamni sloj

deseyea.message: Automatski zatamni pozadinu tijekom otvaranja stranice

deseyealist.message: Automatski zatamni pozadinu na slijedećim stranicama:

deseyen.message: Normalno korištenje (svijetla se ugase kada kliknete na ikonu svijetla)

deseyetimesaver.message: Kada je stranica neaktivna (bez ulaza miša/tipkovnice) nakon određenog vremena, stranica će se automatski zamračiti.

deshardflash.message: Prikaži sve Flash predmete, preskačući URL filter. Ovo bi moglo riješiti probleme kada su neki playeri videozapisa skriveni, ali isto tako će prikazivati oglase.

deshead.message: Prikaži traku YouTube kanala ili ime.

deshovervideo.message: Hover your mouse on the video element for certain number of seconds, after which the webpage automatically dims

desintroduce.message: All the features you're used to, with a brand new look and feel, and personalized to you.

deslampandnightmode.message: Activate the 'Night Mode' option when you click on the gray lamp button

deslikebar.message: Prikaži sviđa mi se/ne sviđa mi se traku na YouTube videozapisima.

deslikebutton.message: Prikaži tipku sviđa mi se i ne sviđa mi se YouTube-a za ovaj videozapis.

desmobileapp.message: Turn Off the Lights is also available for your mobile device.

desmousespotlighta.message: Ako je svjetlo isključeno, prikaži svjetlost oko miša.

desnightactivetime.message: The switch will be visible between the following times:

desnighthover.message: Show a transparent switch on the web page

desnightonly.message: Prikaži Noćni Način samo na slijedećoj(im) stranici(ama):

desnightowl.message: One click converts the page directly into a night theme with a clickable hyperlink. Click it again to return to normal view. Click the lamp button again to disable this feature.

desnighttheme.message: Prikazuje tipku za noćni prekidač ispod web stranice da napravi stranicu tamnom ili svjetlom.

despassword.message: Zahtijeva lozinku za ulaz prije ponovnog uključivanja svjetla.

desplaylist.message: Prikaži YouTube popis za reprodukciju na YouTube stranici.

desreadera.message: Uvijek prikaži traku razine zatamnjenosti kada se svjetla ugase.

desreadern.message: Nikad ne prikazuj traku razine zatamnjenosti.

desreflection.message: Show the reflection effect on all videos

desregularuser.message: This is default and the regular setting for new users. When clicking the gray lamp button, this style will be applied to the current web page.

desremrate.message: If you like Turn Off the Lights™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

desscreenprotection.message: One click shades the page to a soothing orange color to decrease eye strain to all open tabs. Click the lamp button again to disable this feature.

titlelanalyticprivacy.message: Turn Off the Lights browser extension takes your privacy very seriously. The Turn Off the Lights Analytics you are seeing on this page is only stored locally on your computer. Your personal site engagement information will not be sold and not transferred to unaffiliated third parties.

titleuserprofile.message: Below, choose the settings you want to use when clicking the gray lamp button. Each profile has its own features.

vtoolalign.message: A button to center the video player in your browser window

vtoolfilter.message: A button to add a filter in the current video player

vtoolfullscreen.message: A button to set the video player to the full window size

vtoolreplay.message: A button to replay the current video player

vtoolscreenshot.message: A button to take a screenshot of the current video player

vtoolvisualization.message: A button for displaying the audio-visualization for the current video player
